title: Wear Where's my car
summary: Simple application to locate your car from Android wear
description: With this application you can locate your car from anywhere with your android wear .By locating the position of the mobile you can register your car and then see where it is from the screen of your watch .
descriptionHTML:
With this application you can locate your car from anywhere with your android wear .

By locating the position of the mobile you can register your car and then see where it is from the screen of your watch .
comments: Not accurate The idea is to help you find it in a large parking lot.  This keeps is at city level.
It's OK Overall it should be great, but it doesn't link to Google maps to navigate to the car, it's just two dots on the screen which isn't overtly helpful. Good idea though.
